definition: like a clay Bodhisattva fording a river, can't guarantee his own safety/unable to save oneself, let alone others
pinyin: ni2 pu2 sa4 guo4 jiang1 , zi4 shen1 nan2 bao3

definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
